t: Amazon moves media business to OMG and WPP - Ad Age

t: Amazon's Media Account Goes to OMG and WPP
s: September 4, 2024 - ADWEEK has exclusively learned that Omnicom Media Group and WPP have won Amazon’s media review. “After a comprehensive advertising agency review for our consumer business, we’ve chosen to partner with OMG and WPP,” Amazon spokesperson Margaret Callahan said in a statement.

t: Amazon takes its media business to WPP and OMG
s: September 4, 2024 - The e-commerce giant spent $20.3 billion on advertising last year.

t: Amazon splits global media between GroupM and OMG after a decade with IPG | News | Campaign Asia
